bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of wind evil residing in the uterus, with swelling and pain in the external genital region. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fang feng 防風：得葱白能行周身，得澤瀉、藁本療 風，得當歸、芍藥、陽起石、禹餘糧療婦人子臟風 , “With cong bai it is able to pass through the entire body; with ze xie and hao ben it heals wind; with dang gui , shao yao , yang qi shi , and yu yu liang it heals women with infant’s depot wind ”.
